attributes.action: Abolish Prescription charges for long term sufferers of Multiple Sclerosis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To many sufferers in England MS is a long term condition.Sufferers of Epilepsy & Diabetes are exempt from prescription charges but MS sufferers are not automatically exempt.This costs many MS sufferers alot of money they can't afford over the long term.Please could the government address this unfairness as soon as possible.
